channel.title: Locsta || An Amazing Experience || Friendly Economunity || Skilling~PvM~PvP || 2
channel.description:
Locsta is an Economy/PKing based server. This server's main focus is to give players what THEY want. Unlike other hosts who only want to take your money, Locsta gives players the opportunity to let them, in other words, run the server. Locsta's development team updates the server based on a players' suggestion. Here at Locsta, we take into consideration what you want in the game, and what you don't want. The staff of Locsta is always active, let's not forget friendly.
Java 8 Users - [url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/192628028/Locsta.jar]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/192628028/Locsta.jar[/url] Java 7 Users - [url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/192628028/Locsta7.jar]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/192628028/Locsta7.jar[/url]
About the server -
[CODE]*Auto-cache downloading. *Custom loading bar( I just changed the colors of the original one) *Flawless switching(Really flawless not like every other people says) *New Newcomers interface/starters interface *2 Starters per IP only(Starter interfaces) *New Barrow armors (Not every but most) *Steadfast, ragefire, glaiven boots etc *Ring of Wealth *Custom Yelling system *Destroy item *WORKING FLASKS *Al ot of updated armors *New Destroy item (created by me) *New Shop interface *New way for the "Bank All" button *Correct interface for Items Kept On Death *New Skilltab *3 Quests you can complete. *Loyalty titles (Can obtained by doing ::title (newtitle) *RFD Minigame re-done *Fightcave *Some other minigames *PK Armour Degrading *FunPK *Bosses *Max/Comp cape *NEX Added (Only need the right Animations) *All skills work properly *Custom Praying for the God statues/capes *Multiple home's (Change it by talk to Mr. Explorer at starter home ) *All the other homes are not finished, just made the locations add it yourself *Clipped Ranging/Maging *Clipped Following/Npc following *Enchanted Gem made by myself *All working teletabs *Use a Magic Potion(1)-(4) on a Amulet of Glory to get a Amulet of Glory(1)-(4) *Re-done Crafting/Fletching *Whip recoloring with Dye + Whip - Made by myself *Double XP Ring that disappears after wearing for 2 hours *Unique starter adventure~ *DUPE FREE *ALOT MORE GO CHECK![/CODE]
Here's some media for you people.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ARHnHAb.png[/img]

item.title: Locsta || An Amazing Experience || Friendly Economunity || Skilling~PvM~PvP || 2
item.dc:creator: @ZamFyy ZamFyy
item.description:
@ZamFyy wrote:

Locsta is an Economy/PKing based server. This server’s main focus is to give players what THEY want.
Unlike other hosts who only want to take your money, Locsta gives players the opportunity to let them, in other words, run the server.
Locsta’s development team updates the server based on a players’ suggestion.
Here at Locsta, we take into consideration what you want in the game, and what you don’t want.
The staff of Locsta is always active, let’s not forget friendly.

Java 8 Users - https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/192628028/Locsta.jar
Java 7 Users - https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/192628028/Locsta7.jar

About the server -

*Auto-cache downloading. *Custom loading bar( I just changed the colors of the original one) *Flawless switching(Really flawless not like every other people says) *New Newcomers interface/starters interface *2 Starters per IP only(Starter interfaces) *New Barrow armors (Not every but most) *Steadfast, ragefire, glaiven boots etc *Ring of Wealth *Custom Yelling system *Destroy item *WORKING FLASKS *Al ot of updated armors *New Destroy item (created by me) *New Shop interface *New way for the "Bank All" button *Correct interface for Items Kept On Death *New Skilltab *3 Quests you can complete. *Loyalty titles (Can obtained by doing ::title (newtitle) *RFD Minigame re-done *Fightcave *Some other minigames *PK Armour Degrading *FunPK *Bosses *Max/Comp cape *NEX Added (Only need the right Animations) *All skills work properly *Custom Praying for the God statues/capes *Multiple home's (Change it by talk to Mr. Explorer at starter home ) *All the other homes are not finished, just made the locations add it yourself *Clipped Ranging/Maging *Clipped Following/Npc following *Enchanted Gem made by myself *All working teletabs *Use a Magic Potion(1)-(4) on a Amulet of Glory to get a Amulet of Glory(1)-(4) *Re-done Crafting/Fletching *Whip recoloring with Dye + Whip - Made by myself *Double XP Ring that disappears after wearing for 2 hours *Unique starter adventure~ *DUPE FREE *ALOT MORE GO CHECK!
